prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, Organ, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, Organ, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, Organ, and Bass are all present in this song, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, but it does have Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, Organ, and Bass.
